capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: Supervises field officers and contractors to implement works and maintenance programs effectively.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Plans works, operates independently, and maintains relationships to ensure successful project outcomes.

capabilities.name: Think and Solve Problems
capabilities.description: Uses practical knowledge and life skills to solve problems on the spot in a diverse, fast-paced environment.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Works closely with the Field Supervisor and team to preserve natural and cultural heritage.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: Responsible for supervising safe work practices and adherence to WH&S requirements.

capabilities.name: Manage Self
capabilities.description: Shows enthusiasm and motivation to work with others and succeed in a diverse role.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Maintains relationships with field staff, contractors, and the broader Area team.

capabilities.name: Technology
capabilities.description: Uses various software programs for administrative and organisational tasks.

capabilities.name: Project Management
capabilities.description: Coordinates tasks such as maintenance, construction, pest and weed control, and fire management activities.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.description: Leading a team in the field to maintain and construct park facilities and protect cultural sites.

skills.name: Operational Planning
skills.description: Planning and executing field and operational activities, including pest and weed control.

skills.name: Safety Management
skills.description: Ensuring all duties are carried out safely in accordance with WH&S requirements.

generalRole.title: Senior Field Operations Officer
generalRole.description: This role involves supervising field operations related to conservation, maintenance, and enhancement of natural and cultural heritage within national parks, requiring a blend of technical, operational, and leadership skills.
